KSIntScatteringBuilder.h
1 #ifndef Kassiopeia_KSIntScatteringBuilder_h_
2 #define Kassiopeia_KSIntScatteringBuilder_h_
3 
4 #include "KComplexElement.hh"
5 #include "KSIntScattering.h"
6 #include "KToolbox.h"
7 
8 using namespace Kassiopeia;
9 namespace katrin
10 {
11 
12  class KSIntCalculatorSet
13  {
14  public:
15  KSIntCalculatorSet();
16  virtual ~KSIntCalculatorSet();
17 
18  public:
19  virtual void AddCalculator( KSIntCalculator* aCalculator ) = 0;
20  virtual void ReleaseCalculators( KSIntScattering* aScattering ) = 0;
21  };
22 
23  typedef KComplexElement< KSIntScattering > KSIntScatteringBuilder;
24 
25  template< >
26  inline bool KSIntScatteringBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
27  {
28  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
29  {
30  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KNamed::SetName );
31  return true;
32  }
33  if( aContainer->GetName() == "split" )
34  {
35  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSIntScattering::SetSplit );
36  return true;
37  }
38  if( aContainer->GetName() == "density" )
39  {
40  KSIntDensity* tDensityCalculator = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSIntDensity >( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
41  fObject->SetDensity( tDensityCalculator->Clone() );
42  return true;
43  }
44  if( aContainer->GetName() == "calculator" )
45  {
46  KSIntCalculator* tCalculator = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSIntCalculator >( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
47  fObject->AddCalculator( tCalculator );
48  return true;
49  }
50  if( aContainer->GetName() == "calculators" )
51  {
52  std::vector< KSIntCalculator* > aCalculatorVector = KToolbox::GetInstance().GetAll< KSIntCalculator >( aContainer->AsReference< std::string >() );
53  std::vector< KSIntCalculator* >::iterator tIt;
54  for( tIt = aCalculatorVector.begin(); tIt != aCalculatorVector.end(); tIt++ )
55  {
56  fObject->AddCalculator( (*tIt) );
57  }
58  return true;
59  }
60  if( aContainer->GetName() == "enhancement" )
61  {
62  aContainer->CopyTo( fObject, &KSIntScattering::SetEnhancement );
63  return true;
64  }
65  return false;
66  }
67 
68  template< >
69  inline bool KSIntScatteringBuilder::AddElement( KContainer* aContainer )
70  {
71  if( aContainer->Is< KSIntDensity >() == true )
72  {
73  aContainer->ReleaseTo( fObject, &KSIntScattering::SetDensity );
74  return true;
75  }
76  if( aContainer->Is< KSIntCalculator >() == true )
77  {
78  aContainer->ReleaseTo( fObject, &KSIntScattering::AddCalculator );
79  return true;
80  }
81  if( aContainer->Is< KSIntCalculatorSet >() == true )
82  {
83  KSIntCalculatorSet* tSet = NULL;
84  aContainer->ReleaseTo( tSet );
85  tSet->ReleaseCalculators( fObject );
86  delete tSet;
87  return true;
88  }
89  return false;
90  }
91 
92 }
